analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xe6b7743e2b9aa2d0a9b163c4e69186abb57817d9.sol:
	Contract KukyCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xe6b7743e2b9aa2d0a9b163c4e69186abb57817d9.sol#347-348)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0xe6b7743e2b9aa2d0a9b163c4e69186abb57817d9.sol:
